explanation: [0-0] A little boy dressed as a fireman stands in front of a toy firetruck. He is next to a yellow house with a red fire station in the background. The yellow house is on fire.

[0-9] The little boy drives the truck forward, and then another little boy dressed as a fireman appears. The scene changes to the little boy in the fireman costume taking out a water gun, then cuts again to a fireman doll using a water gun to put out the fire. The scene shifts back to the two little boys using water guns to extinguish the fire on the yellow house.
